title: Van der Breggen Crashes Hard, Loses Time in First Stage of Itzulia Rematch with Vollering
content:
Bittersweet opening to Basque race for SD Worx-Protime as Bredewold wins sprint, Van der Breggen suffers early losses after nasty crash.

Read the full article at Van der Breggen Crashes Hard, Loses Time in First Stage of Itzulia Rematch with Vollering on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
